description: This Dart source file defines a NotesProvider class which manages the runtime state and business logic for handling notes in a Flutter application. It exposes APIs for loading, filtering, creating, updating, deleting, and toggling favorites of notes, acting as an intermediary between the UI and the NotesRepository data layer.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that provides UI-friendly APIs to manage notes, handle filters, and interact with the NotesRepository.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider and loads the initial data once.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads the notes with current filters.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query filter and reloads notes accordingly.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note, returning the created note with assigned ID.

methods.name: editNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note and returns the updated instance.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a note by ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note from the current cache by ID.

methods.name: _reload
methods.description: Internal method to reload notes from repository based on current filters and update counters.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to update loading state and notify listeners.
